at.erp.light.view.controller.adressmanagement

Class PersonController

  • java.lang.Object
    • at.erp.light.view.controller.adressmanagement.PersonController

  • @RestController
public class PersonController
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is a RestController.
    It manages calls concerning persons.
    Author:
    Matthias Schnöll

    • Method Detail

      • getAllPersons

        @RequestMapping(value="secure/person/getAll")
public java.util.List<PersonDTO> getAllPersons()
        Returns a list with all persons in the system.
        Also includes all inactive persons.
        Returns:
        list with all persons

      • getAllActivePersons

        @RequestMapping(value="secure/person/getAllActive")
public java.util.List<PersonDTO> getAllActivePersons()
        Returns a list with all active persons in the system.
        persons which are marked as inactive are not included.
        Returns:
        list with all active persons

      • getAllActivePersonsReducedData

        @RequestMapping(value="secure/person/reducedData/getAllActive")
public java.util.List<PersonDTO> getAllActivePersonsReducedData()
        Returns a list with all persons in the system.
        Inactive persons are also included.
        The list only contains basic data to reduce transfer data.
        Following data is not included: systemUser, comment, updateTimestamp, address, city, zip, country, loginEmail, permission, lastEditor, types, emails, telephones
        Returns:
        list with all persons

      • getPersonById

        @RequestMapping(value="secure/person/getPersonById/{id}")
public PersonDTO getPersonById(@PathVariable
                                     int id)
        Returns the person with the given Id.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the requested person
        Returns:
        PersonDTO object

                                      javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)

      • deletePersonById

        @RequestMapping(value="secure/person/deletePersonById/{id}")
public ControllerMessage deletePersonById(@PathVariable
                                                int id,
                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request)
        Deletes the person with the given Id.
        The person is marked as inactive in the system.
        Existing contactPerson entries are removed for the given person
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the person which should be deleted
        request -
        Returns:
        ControllerMessage showing the success of the call

      • resetPasswordForId

                                                  int id,

                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                            java.security.NoSuchAlgorithmException
        Reset the password for the person with the given Id.
        Parameters:
        id - Id of the Person which the password should be reset for

        Returns:

      • changeCurrentUserPassword

        @RequestMapping(value="secure/person/changeCurrentUserPassword")
public ControllerMessage changeCurrentUserPassword(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest httpServletRequest,
                                                         @RequestBody
                                                         ChangePasswordObject changePasswordObject)
                                            throws java.io.IOException

        Parameters:

      • downloadCSV

        @RequestMapping(value="secure/person/getAllPersonsAsCSV")
public void downloadCSV(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                 throws java.io.IOException
        Generates a csv file containing all persons.
        Inactive persons are also included in the csv file.
        The file is returned by writing directly to the response stream.
        Parameters:
        response -
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException
